post.description: Creates a new user account with username, password, and CAPTCHA verification. Generates a recovery mnemonic phrase for account restoration.

parameters.description: Registration credentials including username, password, and CAPTCHA
parameters.name: request

200.description: Example: {\"message\": \"Account created successfully. Save your recovery phrase!\", \"encrypted\": \"word1 word2 word3...\"}

500.description: Example: {\"error\": \"failed to create user, maybe user exists\"}

post.description: Restores access to a user account using the recovery mnemonic phrase and sets a new password. Requires CAPTCHA verification.

parameters.description: Account restoration data including username, mnemonic, new password, and CAPTCHA
parameters.name: request

200.description: Account restored successfully with new JWT token

400.description: Invalid input, CAPTCHA failure, or invalid mnemonic

500.description: Internal server error during account restoration

get.description: Verifies the user's answer against the stored CAPTCHA challenge. Consumes the CAPTCHA token upon successful verification.

parameters.description: User's answer to the CAPTCHA challenge
parameters.name: answer
